thread.title: Lakme Fashion Week 2017: Malaika Arora sizzles on the runway as she kickstarts day 5 – view pics
thread.title_full: Lakme Fashion Week 2017: Malaika Arora sizzles on the runway as she kickstarts day 5 – view pics

author: Karan Shah
title: Lakme Fashion Week 2017: Malaika Arora sizzles on the runway as she kickstarts day 5 – view pics
text:
Malaika Arora Khan looks superhot in hot pants – check out pics 
After an average day 4, Malaika Arora brought a fantastic start to day 5 as she walked the ramp for Divya Reddy. Being a pro at ramp walks, Malaika sizzled as she walked for the star designer. The actress looked stunning and turned a lot of heads when she walked graciously on the ramp. 
Wearing a red simple and modern choli paired with a yellow lehenga , Maliaka couldn’t have looked any better. The lehenga had a lot of intricate embellishments and floral embroidery. She completed her look with some jewellery and a shimmery dupatta . 
Divya’s collection was fantastic. It had simple yet elegant designs with a lot of detailing work. We saw floral embroidery, shimmery embellishments, frilled bottoms and a lot of handicraft technique. The designers line had dresses, sarees, ghagra and lehenga cholis and layered skirts 
Apart from Malaika, Neerja actor Jim Sarbh also walked the ramp for Khanijo during the first show. The actor looked dapper as he took to the runway. He sported a light yellow jacket with similar pants and shirt. Also Read: Lakme Fashion Week Summer/Resort 2017: The gorgeous Karisma Kapoor twirls as she flags off day 4 in style – view pics 
Khanijo’s collection boasted of a lot of stylish jackets, shirts and pants. We saw a lot of buttons in his outfits and pants too, making them really cool wears for this summer. His outfits had a khadi effect and we totally loved his collection. 
On the professional front, Malaika Arora was last seen judging India’s Got Talent 7. She is still to inform us about her next few projects. Jim Sarbh, on the other hand, will be a part of Raabta, Padmavati and Sanjay Dutt’ s biopic. Anyway, checkout the pictures and videos from the show right here:
